Text:
The Subtitles have typos and are out of sync, so in VLC Media Player, you can go to Tools ---> Track Sync. Then set Advance of subtitles over video to -6.000 s. I tried to look for better subs but this is the next best option I guess, hope it helps.

If you don't use VLC media player, it's worth googling and downloading, it's easier than finding working subtitles trust me.
